name: Bangla Letter Matching Game
description:
It is an android puzzle game most effective for learing Bangla letters. There are 11 puzzled letters. Player has to match every letters one by one. Before playing , one can see Tutorial . In final player can learn to recognize Bangla letters .
  • Aim:
Alphabet is the most important part for learning a language. Bangla Letter Matching wiil learn a player Bangla alphabet.
  • Developer's note:
Bangla language has been ranked at 7th position among 100 most spoken languages across the world. This language is a pride in this world . I have tried a little to spread the beauty of the Bangla alphabet worldwide through a simple game. I will try to bring more updates and effective features in later versions. Thanks in advance.
